EmailTemplate.name: 17-GEPS-XLE-Email-SBC for E Nurture-T001ZO.Email 8 Consideration
EmailTemplate.subject: Miercom Tests: Nokia SBC Leads in Cloud Deployments
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Nokia SBC Sets Benchmarks in Performance Testing When choosing an SBC, you need a partner and a product that you can trust to deliver high-quality results.
After completing independent performance and function validation testing, Miercom has awarded the cloud-based Nokia SBC with the prestigious Miercom Performance Certified certification, where it set the benchmark for performance and security in fixed, cable and mobile networks.
Key findings from Miercom’s testing report include:
- Complete mitigation of DDoS attacks without degradation in performance
- High resiliency in failover tests with 100% successful handover of established calls - Highest per-VNF capacity for software-based media and signaling Enjoy! {{my.Email Signature Person}} {{my.Email Signature Title}}, Nokia © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> · Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> · Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Twitter}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Linkedin}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Facebook}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Youtube}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Blog}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
